On June 22, Lieutenant Moyer responded to a dangerous pursuit that  ended in Lewes, Delaware, where he came under direct fire from a  suspect wielding an AR-15. Under threat, Lieutenant Moyer held the line  and even helped evacuate a wounded resident to safety.
